title: LF team/people to play with
body: Hi all, just wondering if anyone in Bronze or just starting out ranked/level 30 (Im only in B4 XD) would be interested in creating a new ranked team-where we start from the bottom and climb our way up. If ranked isn't on your radar just yet, I'd be happy to add more fellow league players and play some normals with and have fun. A chilled team is always good, so feel free to add me/message me in game :)

replies.body: im silver V but am interested in playing :D sounds like a lot of fun :)
